item.title: FireshellCTF Against the Perfect discord Inquisitor 1 and 2
item.description: Prompt 1 Youâ€™re on a journey and come to the Tavern of a Kingdom Enemy, you need to get information of a secret organization for the next quest. Be careful about the Inquisitor! He can ban you from this world. TL;DR find the flag Kingdom Chall HINT: Title/Chall name Prompt 2 There is a mage in the tavern that reveals secrets from the place. He is friendly, so he can help you!
